text: De La Salle College Dundalk is a Secondary School for boys in Dundalk, County Louth, Ireland. ==History== The De La Salle school was founded in Dundalk in 1899. It began in Castletown in the parish of St. Patrick. In 1979, the primary school moved to its present location on the Castleblayney Road. Work started on the new extension in 1997. The current number of pupils is around 750. ==Alumni== *Steve Staunton, former Ireland football player and manager. ==References== ==Other websites== * De La Salle College, Dundalk Category:Schools in Ireland
title: De La Salle College Dundalk
